Text:
hi malikjee... evn i have been waiting for gharonda and libaas desperately... probably the only two movies i have been looking forward to since a long time... i am aware that libaas was never released in India therefore it may not be possible for you to acquire it from somewhere else...but plz try and upload gharonda...
i am a huge fan of your work...and have downloaded all most all your movies...thanks for the amazing collection...looking forward to some good movies in the future as well...TC
